contents.content: _{May use 10 + proficiency bonus (inc level, but no other bonuses) rather than roll.}
contents.title: _{Assurance}

contents.content: _{Deduct hardness, then apply remaining damage to both shield and yourself.}
contents.title: _{Shield Block}

contents.content: _{See in darkness and dim light, but only in black and white.}
contents.title: _{Darkvision}

contents.content: _{To the common folk, the life of a noble seems one of idyllic luxury, but growing up as a noble or member of the aspiring gentry, you know the reality: a nobles lot is obligation and intrigue. Whether you seek to escape your duties by adventuring or to better your station, you have traded silks and pageantry for an adventurers life.}
_{Can use Society to Make an Impresson on a noble, or to pretend to be a (non-specific) noble.}
_{Prepare 5 cantrips each morning from the divine spell list. Cast them indefinitely.}
contents.title: _{Cantrips}

contents.content: _{Prepare spells each morning from the divine spell list.}
contents.title: _{Spells}
